# Test: grove move fails with untracked files
setup_workspace

exec grove add dirty-untracked
exec sh -c 'echo untracked > $WORK/workspace/dirty-untracked/untracked.txt'
exec git -C ../dirty-untracked status --porcelain
! exec grove move dirty-untracked untracked-renamed
stderr 'âœ— .*uncommitted changes'
